Text: Not a bad series, but kind of glorifies wars Americans shouldn't be wasting their time and honor on.

This series has nothing to do with glorifying war. This show and several others like it show a big trend in America right now. Americans are buying guns, ammo, and supplies at an unprecedented rate and have been for the past few years. Online retailers, brick and mortar stores, and even manufacturers can't keep up with demand. Something big is coming soon. Take care.
